e_norse_001.name: Frostbound Barrow
e_norse_001.description: A sealed Norse burial mound where draugr stir beneath the ice.

e_greek_001.name: Labyrinth of Knossos
e_greek_001.description: A twisting maze of ancient stone that hides a beast born of myth.

e_norse_002.name: Jotun Forge
e_norse_002.description: A giant-smithy where fire and rune magic shape weapons of war.

e_greek_002.name: Hades' Vestibule
e_greek_002.description: A shadowed descent that tests resolve before the gates of the underworld.

e_norse_003.name: Yggdrasil Roots
e_norse_003.description: Deep beneath the world-tree, a serpent gnaws at the roots of fate.

e_greek_003.name: Olympus Ascent
e_greek_003.description: Climb the sacred path to Olympus and survive trials set by the gods.

boss_cretan_minotaur.name: Cretan Minotaur
boss_cretan_minotaur.description: The horned beast of the labyrinth

boss_runeforged_jotun.name: Runeforged Jotun
boss_runeforged_jotun.description: A giant warrior bound in rune-iron

boss_warden_styx.name: Warden of the Styx
boss_warden_styx.description: Keeper of the river of souls

boss_stormbearer.name: Stormbearer
boss_stormbearer.description: A champion blessed by the sky gods

q_main_01.name: The Call to Adventure
q_main_01.title: The Call to Adventure
q_main_01.description: A mysterious summons has arrived at your doorstep. The village elder requests your presence urgently - strange creatures have been spotted near the outskirts.

q_main_02.name: First Blood
q_main_02.title: First Blood
q_main_02.description: The elder has tasked you with proving your worth. Defeat 5 goblins that have been terrorizing the farmlands.

q_main_03.name: The Goblin Threat
q_main_03.title: The Goblin Threat
q_main_03.description: Intelligence reports suggest the goblins are amassing forces. Investigate their camp and defeat their scout captain.

q_main_04.name: Into the Den
q_main_04.title: Into the Den
q_main_04.description: The source of the goblin invasion has been discovered - a hidden den in the mountains. Clear the dungeon and defeat the Warrior Goblin boss.

q_main_05.name: Gathering Strength
q_main_05.title: Gathering Strength
q_main_05.description: To face greater threats, you'll need better equipment. Gather materials and craft your first armor set.

q_main_06.name: The Rift Anomaly
q_main_06.title: The Rift Anomaly
q_main_06.description: Strange magical disturbances have been detected near the ancient ruins. Investigate and report your findings.

q_main_07.name: Guardian of Midguard
q_main_07.title: Guardian of Midguard
q_main_07.description: The Rift Defender has awakened! This world boss threatens all of Midguard. Gather your strength and face this ultimate challenge.

q_main_08.name: The Bandit's Fate
q_main_08.title: The Bandit's Fate
q_main_08.description: You capture the bandit leader alive. Decide their fate: show mercy or deliver justice.

branches.choice: Spare the bandit
Turn them in

q_main_08a.name: Mercy's Price
q_main_08a.title: Mercy's Price
q_main_08a.description: Your mercy earns you a secret route to the bandit cache. Retrieve the cache before rival thieves arrive.

q_main_08b.name: Justice Served
q_main_08b.title: Justice Served
q_main_08b.description: The guard rewards you for the bandit's capture. A final raid on the hideout remains.

q_side_01.name: Lost Livestock
q_side_01.title: Lost Livestock
q_side_01.description: Farmer Jeb's chickens have escaped their coop! Help him round them up before the goblins eat them.

q_side_02.name: Herb Collection
q_side_02.title: Herb Collection
q_side_02.description: The village healer needs healing herbs for her potions. Gather moonflowers from the forest.

q_side_03.name: The Blacksmith's Request
q_side_03.title: The Blacksmith's Request
q_side_03.description: The local blacksmith needs ore to forge new weapons for the village guard.

q_side_04.name: Wolf Pack Menace
q_side_04.title: Wolf Pack Menace
q_side_04.description: A pack of wolves has been attacking travelers on the road. Thin their numbers to make the roads safer.

q_side_05.name: Treasure Hunter's Map
q_side_05.title: Treasure Hunter's Map
q_side_05.description: You've found a torn treasure map! Piece together the clues and find the buried treasure.

q_side_06.name: The Missing Merchant
q_side_06.title: The Missing Merchant
q_side_06.description: A wealthy merchant never arrived at the village. Search the forest path for clues about his disappearance.

q_side_07.name: Mushroom Madness
q_side_07.title: Mushroom Madness
q_side_07.description: The tavern keeper needs rare mushrooms for his famous stew. Find them in the dark caves.

q_side_08.name: Ghost Stories
q_side_08.title: Ghost Stories
q_side_08.description: Villagers report seeing spirits near the old graveyard. Investigate and put the restless souls to peace.

q_side_09.name: The Fishing Competition
q_side_09.title: The Fishing Competition
q_side_09.description: The annual fishing contest is here! Catch the biggest fish to win the grand prize.

q_side_10.name: Bandit Hideout
q_side_10.title: Bandit Hideout
q_side_10.description: A band of thieves has set up camp in the northern woods. Clear them out and recover the stolen goods.

q_side_11.name: The Hermit's Wisdom
q_side_11.title: The Hermit's Wisdom
q_side_11.description: A wise hermit living in the mountains seeks rare ingredients for a powerful potion.

q_side_12.name: Arena Champion
q_side_12.title: Arena Champion
q_side_12.description: Prove your combat prowess in the village arena by defeating 3 waves of increasingly difficult enemies.

q_side_13.name: Whispers in the Woods
q_side_13.title: Whispers in the Woods
q_side_13.description: Strange voices echo through the forest at night. Investigate the source and decide how to respond.

branches.choice: Help the spirit
Drive it away

q_side_13a.name: Spirit's Favor
q_side_13a.title: Spirit's Favor
q_side_13a.description: The spirit asks you to cleanse corrupted roots. Aid it to earn a blessing.

q_side_13b.name: Warded Trail
q_side_13b.title: Warded Trail
q_side_13b.description: You choose to banish the spirit. Place warding stones to protect the village.

side.name: The Hermit's Wisdom

side.name: Arena Champion

side.description: Prove your combat prowess in the village arena by defeating 3 waves of increasingly difficult enemies.

side.name: Whispers in the Woods

side.description: Strange voices echo through the forest at night. Investigate the source and decide how to respond.

side.name: Spirit's Favor
side.title: Spirit's Favor
side.description: The spirit asks you to cleanse corrupted roots. Aid it to earn a blessing.

side.name: Warded Trail
side.title: Warded Trail
side.description: You choose to banish the spirit. Place warding stones to protect the village.

dungeons.name: Goblin's den
dungeons.description: The den was mysteriously wiped overnight with no signs of anyone entering nor leaving, find and kill anyone you find in the den and report the info gathered.

main.name: Ascension to Asgard
main.title: Ascension to Asgard
main.description: You've been chosen by the All-Father to ascend to Asgard, realm of the gods. The Bifrost opens, but the path demands an oath.

main.name: Bifrost Oath
main.title: Bifrost Oath
main.description: Heimdall requires a vow before you step onto the bridge. Speak your oath and face a brief trial of intent.

main.name: Hall of Echoes
main.title: Hall of Echoes
main.description: You walk the halls where legends are sung. Earn the respect of the Einherjar and learn the laws of Asgard.

main.name: Seat Among Gods
main.title: Seat Among Gods
main.description: Odin grants you a place in the high hall. Your first charge is to stand as Asgard's shield.

main.name: Trial of Valor
main.title: Trial of Valor
main.description: Prove your worth to the Einherjar by completing the Trial of Valor - an ancient test of strength and courage.

main.name: Trial of Steel
main.title: Trial of Steel
main.description: Enter the arena of Valhalla and face the first round of challengers to prove your skill.

main.name: Trial of Resolve
main.title: Trial of Resolve
main.description: Hold the shield wall against relentless waves. The trial measures courage more than strength.

main.name: Trial of Valor
main.title: Trial of Valor
main.description: The final challenge is yours to choose: mercy in the face of danger, or fury against the mightiest foe.

branches.choice: Protect the wounded under heavy fire
Hunt the champion of the arena

main.name: Valor's Mercy
main.title: Valor's Mercy
main.description: You shield the fallen and carry them to safety. The hall cheers for a warrior who values life.

main.name: Valor's Fury
main.title: Valor's Fury
main.description: You clash with the arena champion in a duel that shakes the rafters. The Einherjar salute your fearlessness.

main.name: Frost Giant Invasion
main.title: Frost Giant Invasion
main.description: Jotunheim's frost giants are marching on Asgard! Confer with Heimdall at the Rainbow Bridge and prepare a response.

main.name: Bridge Skirmish
main.title: Bridge Skirmish
main.description: The first wave crashes into the Bifrost. Defeat the frost giant vanguard and secure the bridgehead.

main.name: Bifrost Breach
main.title: Bifrost Breach
main.description: A second squad pushes through the storm and damages the bridge wards. Repair them before the route collapses.

main.name: Storm or Shield
main.title: Storm or Shield
main.description: Heimdall gives you two options: pursue the retreating giants into the storm, or fortify the bridge against a second wave.

branches.choice: Pursue the retreating giants
Fortify the bridge

main.name: Icebound Pursuit
main.title: Icebound Pursuit
main.description: Chase the giants into the blizzard and defeat their warleader before they regroup.

main.name: Bridge of Aegis
main.title: Bridge of Aegis
main.description: Reinforce the Bifrost wards with Heimdall and repel the second wave of giants.

main.name: The Stolen Relic
main.title: The Stolen Relic
main.description: Loki has stolen a powerful artifact from Odin's vault! Track him down through the Nine Realms and retrieve it.

main.name: Mask and Tracks
main.title: Mask and Tracks
main.description: Loki's trail is baited with false clues. Follow the subtle markers only a trickster would use.

main.name: Shadows of Svartalfheim
main.title: Shadows of Svartalfheim
main.description: The relic's aura leads into the dark elf tunnels. Navigate traps and decipher a stolen rune map.

main.name: Forked Trail
main.title: Forked Trail
main.description: You corner Loki's illusion. He offers two routes: chase him into Helheim, or return to Odin with proof and set a trap.

branches.choice: Pursue Loki into Helheim
Return to Odin and set a counter trap

main.name: Helheim Chase
main.title: Helheim Chase
main.description: You race through the frozen veil and fight Loki's shades to seize the relic at the edge of Hel's throne.

main.name: Odin's Snare
main.title: Odin's Snare
main.description: You and Odin weave a trap around the vault. Loki returns for the relic and is forced into a direct confrontation.

main.name: Valhalla's Call
main.title: Valhalla's Call
main.description: The gates of Valhalla open only to the greatest warriors. Complete legendary feats to earn your place among the honored dead.

main.name: Feats of the Living
main.title: Feats of the Living
main.description: Prove your worth in the living realm: save a village on Midgard and return with their oath of thanks.

main.name: Feats of the Fallen
main.title: Feats of the Fallen
main.description: Stand with the Einherjar in a reenactment of their final battle and learn the cost of glory.

main.name: Judgment of the Hall
main.title: Judgment of the Hall
main.description: The hall offers two paths to earn your seat. Choose the feat that matches your spirit.

branches.choice: Duel the champion of Valhalla
Rescue the fallen from a cursed field

main.name: Champion's Duel
main.title: Champion's Duel
main.description: You face Valhalla's champion in a duel judged by Odin's ravens. Win, and the gates open for you.

main.name: Field of Echoes
main.title: Field of Echoes
main.description: You guide lost souls to Valhalla while fending off spirits that feed on regret.

main.name: Ragnarok Approaches
main.title: Ragnarok Approaches
main.description: Prophecies speak of the end times. Gather the legendary heroes of old to prepare for the final battle.

main.name: Signs in the Sky
main.title: Signs in the Sky
main.description: Read the omens in the skies of Asgard and report the patterns to the council.

main.name: Call the Legends
main.title: Call the Legends
main.description: Seek the old heroes who doubt the prophecies. Convince them with deeds, not promises.

main.name: Call to Arms
main.title: Call to Arms
main.description: Two factions answer the summons. Choose which force you will rally first.

branches.choice: Rally the Vanir warbands
Rally the Einherjar legions

main.name: Vanir Muster
main.title: Vanir Muster
main.description: You win the Vanir by settling an old feud at the border. Their banners rise beside Asgard.

main.name: Einherjar Muster
main.title: Einherjar Muster
main.description: You break a siege at Valhalla's gates and restore faith in the final stand.

main.name: The Final Battle
main.title: The Final Battle
main.description: Ragnarok is upon us! Lead the armies of Asgard against Surtr and his fire giants in the battle that will reshape the Nine Realms.

main.name: March to Vigrid
main.title: March to Vigrid
main.description: Lead the host to the battle plain. Hold formation as fire storms test the army's resolve.

main.name: Clash at the Ford
main.title: Clash at the Ford
main.description: The river turns to steam as giants advance. You must break their line to reach Surtr.

main.name: Fate of the Field
main.title: Fate of the Field
main.description: The battle hinges on your decision. Do you hold the line or strike directly at Surtr?

branches.choice: Hold the line and save the army
Lead a strike team against Surtr

main.name: Shield of the Realms
main.title: Shield of the Realms
main.description: You hold the line as Surtr's giants crash. Asgard stands because you refused to break.

main.name: Spear of Ragnarok
main.title: Spear of Ragnarok
main.description: You cut through the chaos and face Surtr's guard. The battle pivots on your daring assault.

side.name: Mead Hall Brawl
side.title: Mead Hall Brawl
side.description: Earn the respect of Asgard's warriors by winning a tavern brawl against the toughest Einherjar.

side.name: Broken Benches
side.title: Broken Benches
side.description: The brawl spills across the hall. Keep the fight fair and stop the worst offenders.

side.name: Wager of Honor
side.title: Wager of Honor
side.description: A veteran Einherjar offers a wager: win their respect without humiliating the fallen.

side.name: Mead Hall Brawl
side.title: Mead Hall Brawl
side.description: Choose how to end the brawl.

branches.choice: Win bare-handed to show restraint
Accept a formal duel with blunted steel

side.name: Bare-Handed Honor
side.title: Bare-Handed Honor
side.description: You win without weapons, earning cheers for restraint and control.

side.name: Blades of Respect
side.title: Blades of Respect
side.description: You accept a formal duel and prove your skill. The hall roars in approval.

side.name: Yggdrasil's Blessing
side.title: Yggdrasil's Blessing
side.description: The World Tree needs tending. Gather sacred water from the Well of Urd to nourish its roots.

side.name: Well of Urd
side.title: Well of Urd
side.description: Reach the well's edge and collect the water without disturbing the Norns' threads.

side.name: Rootsong Ritual
side.title: Rootsong Ritual
side.description: A ritual chant awakens the roots. The water must be poured at a perfect moment.

side.name: Yggdrasil's Blessing
side.title: Yggdrasil's Blessing
side.description: Decide how the blessing spreads across the roots.

branches.choice: Pour the water directly into the deepest roots
Entrust the water to Ratatoskr to carry

side.name: Deep Root Gift
side.title: Deep Root Gift
side.description: You steady the roots with the sacred water. Yggdrasil hums with new strength.

side.name: Swift Branches
side.title: Swift Branches
side.description: Ratatoskr spreads the blessing swiftly, but you must fend off root spirits along the way.

side.name: Heimdall's Watch
side.title: Heimdall's Watch
side.description: Assist Heimdall in monitoring threats from the other realms by investigating suspicious magical signatures.

side.name: Watchtower Signals
side.title: Watchtower Signals
side.description: Track three strange flares across the realms and report which threaten Asgard.

side.name: Shadow Trail
side.title: Shadow Trail
side.description: A suspicious trail leads to a hidden observer near the bridge. Follow without alerting them.

side.name: Heimdall's Watch
side.title: Heimdall's Watch
side.description: How do you end the surveillance?

branches.choice: Confront the spy and demand answers
Set a trap and capture the spy

side.name: Open Confrontation
side.title: Open Confrontation
side.description: You force the spy into the open and earn Heimdall's respect for bold action.

side.name: Silent Capture
side.title: Silent Capture
side.description: Your trap closes perfectly. Heimdall praises your patience and precision.

side.name: The Valkyries' Test
side.title: The Valkyries' Test
side.description: A Valkyrie challenges you to prove your mettle. Complete her combat trials to earn divine favor.

side.name: Skyborne Trial
side.title: Skyborne Trial
side.description: Ride with a Valkyrie to the clouds and face a midair ambush.

side.name: Shield Wall
side.title: Shield Wall
side.description: Stand as the anchor of a shield wall against an overwhelming force.

side.name: The Valkyries' Test
side.title: The Valkyries' Test
side.description: The Valkyries offer two final trials. Choose your path.

branches.choice: Protect the fallen during a retreat
Charge the enemy leader

side.name: Guardian's Wing
side.title: Guardian's Wing
side.description: You cover the retreat and preserve lives. The Valkyries honor your protection.

side.name: Sky Spear
side.title: Sky Spear
side.description: You pierce the enemy leadership and end the trial in a single bold strike.

side.name: Dwarven Master craft
side.title: Dwarven Mastercraft
side.description: The dwarves of Svartalfheim need rare ores. Mine Uru metal from the depths of Nidavellir.

side.name: Nidavellir Descent
side.title: Nidavellir Descent
side.description: Enter the deep mines and learn the dwarven safety rites.

side.name: Uru Vein
side.title: Uru Vein
side.description: Locate a rare Uru vein guarded by stone constructs and claim enough ore.

side.name: Dwarven Mastercraft
side.title: Dwarven Mastercraft
side.description: The mine collapses. Choose what to save first.

branches.choice: Save the miners trapped behind the fall
Secure the ore and stabilize the tunnel

side.name: Hammer of Mercy
side.title: Hammer of Mercy
side.description: You rescue the miners first. The dwarves praise your priorities and craft a small gift.

side.name: Forge First
side.title: Forge First
side.description: You secure the ore and prevent a total collapse. The forges blaze brighter that night.

side.name: Fenrir's Binding
side.title: Fenrir's Binding
side.description: The great wolf Fenrir has broken free! Help the gods forge new chains to bind the beast.

side.name: Wolf's Trail
side.title: Wolf's Trail
side.description: Track Fenrir's prints across the icy fields before he vanishes into shadow.

side.name: Forged Restraints
side.title: Forged Restraints
side.description: Work with the dwarves to craft a chain that can hold a god-beast.

side.name: Fenrir's Binding
side.title: Fenrir's Binding
side.description: The plan demands a decision in the moment of capture.

branches.choice: Use rune magic to lull Fenrir
Use brute force and direct combat

side.name: Runebound
side.title: Runebound
side.description: You calm the beast long enough to bind him. The gods nod at your restraint.

side.name: Chainbreaker
side.title: Chainbreaker
side.description: You take Fenrir head-on and win a brutal clash to secure the bindings.

side.name: Light Elf Alliance
side.title: Light Elf Alliance
side.description: Negotiate with the Light Elves of Alfheim to secure their aid in the coming war.

side.name: Alfheim Court
side.title: Alfheim Court
side.description: Earn a hearing in the Light Elf court by resolving a border dispute.

side.name: Brightwood Passage
side.title: Brightwood Passage
side.description: Escort the Light Elf envoy through a corrupted grove.

side.name: Light Elf Alliance
side.title: Light Elf Alliance
side.description: Choose the terms of the alliance.

branches.choice: Offer Asgard military aid and shared defense
Offer autonomy and trade in exchange for support

side.name: Shielded Alliance
side.title: Shielded Alliance
side.description: The Light Elves accept your military pact. Their archers pledge to fight beside Asgard.

side.name: Free Alliance
side.title: Free Alliance
side.description: You secure a trade accord and a promise of aid without losing their independence.

side.name: Midgard Serpent Sighting
side.title: Midgard Serpent Sighting
side.description: Jormungandr has been spotted near the shores. Investigate before the World Serpent brings catastrophe.

side.name: Coastline Recon
side.title: Coastline Recon
side.description: Survey the shoreline for signs of the serpent's passing.

side.name: Deepwater Signs
side.title: Deepwater Signs
side.description: Dive into the cold waters to confirm whether Jormungandr is rising or only passing.

side.name: Midgard Serpent Sighting
side.title: Midgard Serpent Sighting
side.description: Decide how to respond to the sighting.

branches.choice: Warn Asgard and rally defenses
Track the serpent alone to learn its path

side.name: Shield the Shores
side.title: Shield the Shores
side.description: You fortify the shoreline and prevent panic. The coast is ready.

side.name: Serpent's Path
side.title: Serpent's Path
side.description: You track the serpent's wake and return with knowledge of its route.

side.name: Bifrost Repairs
side.title: Bifrost Repairs
side.description: The Rainbow Bridge has sustained damage from battles. Gather cosmic crystals to repair its structure.

side.name: Shard Hunt
side.title: Shard Hunt
side.description: Locate three cosmic crystals scattered across a storm-warped ridge.

side.name: Weave the Light
side.title: Weave the Light
side.description: Help Heimdall set the shards into the bridge's weave.

side.name: Bifrost Repairs
side.title: Bifrost Repairs
side.description: A final material is missing. Decide who to request aid from.

branches.choice: Ask the dwarves for precision metalwork
Ask the Vanir for living crystal sap

side.name: Dwarven Lattice
side.title: Dwarven Lattice
side.description: Dwarven craft restores the bridge's strength. It shines like new.

side.name: Vanir Bloom
side.title: Vanir Bloom
side.description: The Vanir provide living crystals that mend the bridge in a surge of light.

side.name: Odin's Ravens
side.title: Odin's Ravens
side.description: Huginn and Muninn have gone missing. Search the Nine Realms for the All-Father's prized companions.

side.name: Shadow Hunt
side.title: Shadow Hunt
side.description: Track scattered feathers and whispering signs across the realms.

side.name: Whispers in Mist
side.title: Whispers in Mist
side.description: A fog of illusion hides the ravens. Use wisdom to discern which voices are real.

side.name: Odin's Ravens
side.title: Odin's Ravens
side.description: Decide how to recover the ravens safely.

branches.choice: Trust the ravens and follow their call
Bind the ravens with a protective rune

side.name: Call of Thought
side.title: Call of Thought
side.description: You follow the true call and guide the ravens home. Odin is pleased.

side.name: Rune of Memory
side.title: Rune of Memory
side.description: You bind the ravens to safety and escort them home through the mist.

side.name: Skadi's Hunt
side.title: Skadi's Hunt
side.description: The goddess of winter challenges you to a hunt. Track and slay the legendary Ice Drake.

side.name: Frozen Tracks
side.title: Frozen Tracks
side.description: Follow the drake's trail through a blizzard and survive the whiteout.

side.name: Whiteout Ambush
side.title: Whiteout Ambush
side.description: The drake attacks from the fog. Hold your ground and keep Skadi safe.

side.name: Skadi's Hunt
side.title: Skadi's Hunt
side.description: Choose your final approach to the hunt.

branches.choice: Go for the quick kill
Protect Skadi and wait for the opening

side.name: Hunter's Mercy
side.title: Hunter's Mercy
side.description: You strike decisively and end the hunt. Skadi respects your resolve.

side.name: Guardian of Winter
side.title: Guardian of Winter
side.description: You protect Skadi and finish the drake when the moment is right.

side.name: Mimir's Wisdom
side.title: Mimir's Wisdom
side.description: Seek counsel from Mimir's head at the Well of Wisdom. He offers knowledge, but only if you prove your intent.

side.name: Well of Echoes
side.title: Well of Echoes
side.description: Answer Mimir's first riddle and retrieve a rune from the well's depths guarded by spirits.

side.name: The Price of Wisdom
side.title: The Price of Wisdom
side.description: Mimir demands payment: a memory of your past or a relic from your travels. Choose your tribute.

branches.choice: Trade a cherished memory
Offer a relic

side.name: Memory's Weight
side.title: Memory's Weight
side.description: Relive a painful moment and surrender its memory. Mimir grants a final riddle and blessing.

side.name: Relic of the Past
side.title: Relic of the Past
side.description: Offer a relic and defend the well from greedy spirits drawn to its power.

side.name: Thor's Hammer Hunt
side.title: Thor's Hammer Hunt
side.description: Thor has misplaced Mjolnir again! Track the trail of chaos from last night's feast.

side.name: Feast Hall Clues
side.title: Feast Hall Clues
side.description: Question the Einherjar and calm a rowdy brawl to piece together where Mjolnir went.

side.name: Two Trails
side.title: Two Trails
side.description: The trail splits: Heimdall saw a flash at the bridge, while Loki hints at a prank in the forge. Choose a lead.

branches.choice: Ask Heimdall at the Bifrost
Follow Loki to the forge

side.name: Bifrost Glint
side.title: Bifrost Glint
side.description: Heimdall reveals a thief fled across the bridge. Defeat the runner and reclaim Mjolnir.

side.name: Forge of Pranks
side.title: Forge of Pranks
side.description: Loki's prank backfires and a magma sprite runs off with Mjolnir. Chase it down in the forge tunnels.

side.name: Freya's Garden
side.title: Freya's Garden
side.description: Goddess Freya's sacred garden has been defiled by dark magic. Cleanse the corruption and restore its beauty.

side.name: Withered Roses
side.title: Withered Roses
side.description: Trace the corrupted petals to their source and repel the blight spirits.

side.name: Heart of Thorns
side.title: Heart of Thorns
side.description: A thorned core grows beneath the garden. Confront it before it spreads.

side.name: Freya's Garden
side.title: Freya's Garden
side.description: Choose how to cleanse the heart of the garden.

branches.choice: Cleanse with light and patience
Cut out the corruption quickly

side.name: Bloom Restored
side.title: Bloom Restored
side.description: You restore the garden without harming its spirit. Freya thanks you with a smile.

side.name: Thorned Sacrifice
side.title: Thorned Sacrifice
side.description: You cut out the corruption, saving the garden at the cost of rare blooms.

side.name: The Norns' Prophecy
side.title: The Norns' Prophecy
side.description: The three fates have a message for you. Journey to their sacred grove and hear your destiny.

side.name: Thread of Fate
side.title: Thread of Fate
side.description: Follow a shimmering thread across the roots of Yggdrasil to reach the grove.

side.name: Three Questions
side.title: Three Questions
side.description: The Norns ask three questions that test your will more than your strength.

side.name: The Norns' Prophecy
side.title: The Norns' Prophecy
side.description: Will you accept the prophecy or defy it?

branches.choice: Accept the prophecy and prepare
Defy the prophecy and seek a new path

side.name: Woven Destiny
side.title: Woven Destiny
side.description: You accept the Norns' words and gain clarity for the trials ahead.

side.name: Broken Thread
side.title: Broken Thread
side.description: You defy fate and forge your own path. The Norns watch in silence.

side.name: Loki's Gambit
side.title: Loki's Gambit - A Trickster's Tale
side.description: Loki appears in the shadows, beckoning you with promises of forbidden knowledge. He claims an artifact was stolen from him by dark elves, but his silver tongue makes every word suspect. Begin your investigation.

side.name: Trail of Lies
side.title: Trail of Lies
side.description: Following Loki's directions, you journey to Svartalfheim. Dark elf scouts attack on sight, claiming YOU stole from THEM. Fight through their ambush and capture one for questioning.

side.name: The Dark Truth
side.title: The Dark Truth
side.description: The captured elf reveals Loki stole the artifact from THEM firsta chronos shard capable of rewriting recent history. Now both sides want it. Infiltrate the dark elf vault where it's supposedly hidden.

side.name: Vault of Shadows
side.title: Vault of Shadows
side.description: Deep in the vault, you face the Shadow Wardena construct designed to kill thieves. Defeat it and claim the chronos shard, but Loki appears the moment you touch it. He reveals his TRUE plan.

side.name: The Moment of Truth
side.title: The Moment of Truth
side.description: Loki admits he wants to undo Baldur's deathto rewrite the moment that started his exile. If he succeeds, Ragnarok might be prevented... or accelerated. Trust the trickster's redemption, or report everything to Odin?

branches.choice: Help Loki rewrite history
Report Loki to Odin immediately

side.name: Trickster's Redemption
side.title: Trickster's Redemption
side.description: You helped Loki activate the shard. Time fracturesyou witness Baldur's death, but changing it creates a paradox. Reality splits. You must fight your alternate self to stabilize the timeline. Loki's gambit changes everything.

side.name: Odin's Justice
side.title: Odin's Justice
side.description: Odin intercepts Loki and seals him away. He tasks you with destroying the shard by casting it into Muspelheim's core. Battle through fire giants who want the artifact, then face Surtr himself who claims it for his arsenal.

side.name: The Einherjar's Dilemma
side.title: The Einherjar's Dilemma - Honor and Change
side.description: Einherjar Bjorn Bloodaxe challenges Valhalla's ancient traditions publicly. He claims the endless battle prepares warriors for a war already lost. His words divide the hall. Odin tasks you to investigate before civil war erupts.

side.name: Voices of Discord
side.title: Voices of Discord
side.description: Interview three legendary Einherjar: a conservative champion, a moderate warrior, and Bjorn himself. Each presents compelling arguments. Fight alongside each in training to understand their perspectives before taking a side.

side.name: The Ancient Texts
side.title: The Ancient Texts
side.description: Research in Odin's library reveals prophecies: 'Those who fight as individuals fall as individuals. Unity forged in change shall weather the storm.' But traditionalists claim these texts are forgeries planted by Bjorn. Expose the truth.

side.name: Midnight Duel
side.title: Midnight Duel
side.description: The conservative faction challenges Bjorn to trial by combatyou must represent one side. If you fight FOR tradition, face Bjorn and three reformers. If you fight FOR change, duel the conservative champion and his honor guard.

branches.choice: Defend tradition against Bjorn
Fight alongside Bjorn for change

side.name: Champion of the Old Ways
side.title: Champion of the Old Ways
side.description: You defeated Bjorn in legendary combat. His reforms die with his defeat, but his final words haunt you: 'When Ragnarok comes, your rigid honor will shatter like ice.' Days later, cracks appear in Valhalla's foundationsliterally and metaphorically.

side.name: Revolutionary Alliance
side.title: Revolutionary Alliance
side.description: Victory! Valhalla begins restructuring training to emphasize cooperation. But extremist traditionalists launch a final assault, led by an ancient Einherjar who refuses change. Defeat him and his century-old battalion to secure the new order.

side.name: The Vanir Emissary
side.title: The Vanir Emissary - Ancient Rivalries
side.description: Lady Freya's emissary Skadi arrives in Asgard with alarming news: frost giants are uniting under a new banner. She requests Aesir military aid, but Thor and Tyr distrust her intentions. Investigate her claims before the council votes.

side.name: Peace Treaty Inspection
side.title: Peace Treaty Inspection
side.description: Travel to the Aesir-Vanir border to verify Skadi's claims. You discover frost giant scoutsbut also Vanir soldiers secretly mining near Asgard's territory. Is this invasion prep or resource desperation? Interrogate captured scouts from both sides.

side.name: Hidden Agendas
side.title: Hidden Agendas
side.description: Evidence suggests BOTH sides are hiding something. Vanir mine rare metals for weapons, while Aesir scouts provoked some giant attacks. Meanwhile, giants mass at BOTH borders. Confront Skadi or Thor with what you've learned.

side.name: The Giant King's Message
side.title: The Giant King's Message
side.description: You capture a frost giant general who reveals the truth: HE sent Skadi because both god-realms ignored his peace proposals. Now his patience is spent. Fight your way through his war camp to reach his throne and hear his demands directly.

branches.choice: Broker peace between all three races
Unite Aesir and Vanir against the giants

side.name: Triple Alliance
side.title: Triple Alliance
side.description: You brokered an unprecedented three-way peace. Giants, Aesir, and Vanir sign the Treaty of Nine Realms. But extremists from all sides attack the signing ceremony. Defend the peace against those who profit from eternal war.

side.name: United Pantheon
side.title: United Pantheon
side.description: Your evidence united Aesir and Vanir against the giant threat. A combined army marches to Jotunheim. Lead the final assault against the Giant King's fortress, but his last words warn: 'You gods always choose war. Ragnarok is your reward.'

side.name: Heimdall's Successor
side.title: Heimdall's Successor - The All-Seeing Test
side.description: Heimdall, guardian of Bifrost for eons, announces his search for a successor. He sees something comingsomething even his eyes cannot fully comprehend. Prove yourself worthy through vigilance trials, but first discover what ancient threat looms.

side.name: Eyes That Pierce Realms
side.title: Eyes That Pierce Realms
side.description: Heimdall grants you temporary access to his sight. You see across all nine realms simultaneouslyit's overwhelming. Focus through the chaos to identify 12 hidden threats: assassins, invaders, and dimensional rifts. Miss even one and the trial fails.

side.name: The Sleepless Vigil
side.title: The Sleepless Vigil
side.description: Guard Bifrost for 72 hours without restHeimdall's standard. Waves of enemies test your endurance: dark elves, fire giants, and finally a massive elder wyrm. But the worst threat comes on hour 71 when sleep deprivation causes hallucinations. Trust nothing.

side.name: The Shadow Heimdall Sees
side.title: The Shadow Heimdall Sees
side.description: You passed the trials, but Heimdall reveals why he seeks a replacement: he's foreseen his own death. An entity called the Void Walker phases between realms, invisible even to him. It comes to destroy Bifrost and isolate the realms. Together, hunt this horror.

branches.choice: Accept guardianship and face the Void Walker alone
Fight alongside Heimdall against destiny

side.name: The New Guardian
side.title: The New Guardian
side.description: You become Bifrost's guardian. The Void Walker manifests and Heimdall sacrifices himself to weaken it. Alone, you fight a being that exists half in shadow. Victory comes at the cost of your mentor, but the realms remain connected. The watch continues.

side.name: Defying Prophecy
side.title: Defying Prophecy
side.description: You refuse to let Heimdall face death alone. Together you battle the Void Walker in a legendary fight spanning dimensions. You wound it gravely but it escapes. Heimdall survivesprophecy broken. He names you Co-Guardian. Two sets of eyes are better than one.

side.name: The Dwarf King's Debt
side.title: The Dwarf King's Debt - Forging Legends
side.description: King Brokkr of Nidavellir owes you a blood debt from a past adventure. He offers to forge one legendary item of your choosing, but his forge has grown cold. First, help him reignite it by recovering the primordial ember from Muspelheim's core.

side.name: The Dying Forge
side.title: The Dying Forge
side.description: Journey deep into Nidavellir. The great forges dim as dwarven craftsmanship fades. Brokkr reveals his brother Eitri stole the primordial ember in a jealous rage, claiming he should be king. Find Eitri's hidden workshop and investigate his true motives.

side.name: Brother's Betrayal
side.title: Brother's Betrayal
side.description: Eitri didn't steal the emberhe's trying to PURIFY it. The ember was corrupted by fire giant magic, and using it would doom whoever wields the forged item. Fight through fire giant assassins who want the ember kept corrupted. Reclaim it for purification.

side.name: Choice of Legends
side.title: Choice of Legends
side.description: With the ember purified, the forge blazes. Brokkr apologizes to Eitrifamily reconciled. Now they can forge your legend, but they present a dilemma: forge a weapon that ensures victory but draws enemies to you forever, or armor granting immortality but binding you to Asgard eternally.

branches.choice: Request the weapon of absolute victory
Request the armor of immortality

side.name: Tyrfing's Curse
side.title: Tyrfing's Curse
side.description: The brothers forge Tyrfing, a blade that guarantees victory. But its power attracts every warrior seeking glory. Defend yourself against waves of challengers, culminating in a duel with a corrupted Valkyrie who wants the blade to change Ragnarok's outcome.

side.name: The Deathless Burden
side.title: The Deathless Burden
side.description: The armor makes you immortal, bound to Asgard. Immediately, Odin tasks you with impossible missions knowing you cannot die. Storm a giant king's fortress alone. Enter Helheim to retrieve a lost soul. Survive Nidhogg's lair. Immortality is a weapon others wield.

side.name: Yggdrasil's Keeper
side.title: Yggdrasil's Keeper - The World Tree Dies
side.description: Ratatoskr, the gossip squirrel of Yggdrasil, frantically summons you. The World Tree's roots blacken and wither. If it dies, all Nine Realms collapse into void. Three suspects: dark elf saboteurs, primordial corruption leaking from Ginnungagap, or Nidhogg the root-gnawer.

side.name: The Three Investigations
side.title: The Three Investigations
side.description: Gather evidence at three locations: Svartalfheim for dark elf intel, Ginnungagap's edge for primordial traces, and Nidhogg's lair for the dragon's activities. Each location is deadly. But at each site, you find something impossible: YOUR OWN FOOTPRINTS from the future.

side.name: Time's Cruel Loop
side.title: Time's Cruel Loop
side.description: The evidence reveals horrifying truth: YOU cause the blight, but in a future timeline. Dark elves show you visionsyou'll HAVE TO poison Yggdrasil to stop something worse: a parasitic entity called the World Devourer currently gestating in the tree's heart. Kill the host, kill the parasite.

side.name: The Impossible Choice
side.title: The Impossible Choice
side.description: Confront the World Devourer inside Yggdrasil's heart. It's already awake. Three paths emerge: poison the tree NOW to weaken it before it escapes (dark elf method), try to surgically extract it using primordial magic (risky experimental), or make a deal with Nidhogg who claims he can devour it.

branches.choice: Poison Yggdrasil to weaken the Devourer
Use primordial magic to extract it
Bargain with Nidhogg the dragon

side.name: Necessary Evil
side.title: Necessary Evil
side.description: You poison the tree. Yggdrasil screams across dimensions as its roots wither, but the Devourer weakens enough to kill. You slay it in brutal combat as reality fractures. Yggdrasil survivesbarely. The realms are scarred forever. You're hailed as savior and cursed as destroyer.

side.name: Surgical Precision
side.title: Surgical Precision
side.description: Using primordial magic, you attempt extraction. The procedure is agonizing for the tree and nearly kills you. But you succeedremoving the Devourer intact. It immediately attacks. Defeat it in its pure form, and it drops materials that can heal Yggdrasil completely. Risky, but worth it.

side.name: Dragon's Bargain
side.title: Dragon's Bargain
side.description: Nidhogg agrees to devour the Devourerfor a price. You must let him gnaw Yggdrasil's roots for 100 years uncontested, hastening Ragnarok. He consumes the entity but grows massive with stolen power. Now he's the threat. Fight a god-sized Nidhogg to save tomorrow by breaking today's deal.

side.name: The Forgotten God
side.title: The Forgotten God - Erased from History
side.description: While exploring forgotten vaults beneath Asgard, you discover a sealed chamber. Inside: a god in eternal stasis, their name literally erased from reality. Runes warn: 'Memory's price keeps chaos bound.' But the god's eyes follow you. They're conscious. They've been aware for millennia.

side.name: The Silent Screams
side.title: The Silent Screams
side.description: Using forbidden magic, you briefly connect to the god's mind. Instant agonythey've experienced every second of imprisonment, unable to sleep or forget. They show you memories: they were Baldr's twin, erased because they foresaw and tried to prevent Ragnarok by killing Baldr first.

side.name: Odin's Secret
side.title: Odin's Secret
side.description: Confront Odin. He admits the truth: the forgotten god, Varr's true name, tried to kill Baldr to save everyone. Odin chose sentiment over survival and erased them. Now Ragnarok looms anyway. Odin asks you: was he right to value his son's life over the realm's future?

side.name: The Breaking Point
side.title: The Breaking Point
side.description: Return to the chamber. The seals weaken from your investigation. The forgotten god can almost speak. They offer a bargain: free them and they'll stop Ragnarok using knowledge from their visions. But doing so might erase Baldr's legacy entirely. Reinforce the seals or break them?

branches.choice: Free the forgotten god and prevent Ragnarok
Reinforce the seals and honor Odin's choice

side.name: Truth Unbound
side.title: Truth Unbound
side.description: You free the forgotten god. Reality fractures as they reclaim their name: Forseti, god of justice and reconciliation. They immediately travel backward in time to save Baldr, creating a paradox. You must fight your way through splitting timelines, defeating alternate versions of yourself. Choose which reality survives.

side.name: Eternal Warden
side.title: Eternal Warden
side.description: You reinforce the seals, but Forseti's consciousness latches onto you. Now YOU carry their memories and visions. You become the Forgotten God's warden and heir, knowing the terrible cost of mercy. Use this knowledge to prepare Asgard for Ragnarok the right way.

side.name: The Final Valkyrie
side.title: The Final Valkyrie - Death's Last Messenger
side.description: Gndul, the last Valkyrie from the Age of Heroes, hasn't chosen a soul in three centuries. She's dyingwhen Valkyries fade, they cannot choose where their power goes. She's selected you for her final flight, but this is no honor: you must die a glorious death, then return to claim her mantle.

side.name: The Impossible Trial
side.title: The Impossible Trial
side.description: Gndul explains: to die gloriously, you must face impossible odds and fall in combat against a legendary foe. She transports you to challenge Ymir's Echoa manifestation of the first being's power. This is MEANT to kill you. Fight knowing death is the victory condition.

side.name: Death and Rebirth
side.title: Death and Rebirth
side.description: You fall in legendary combat. Your spirit rises to Valhalla, where Gndul waits. She offers her essenceimmortality, power over death, the ability to guide heroes. But then you see the cost: she's been TRAPPED, unable to truly die for millennia. Do you accept this eternal burden or reject it?

side.name: The Burden of Wings
side.title: The Burden of Wings
side.description: If you reject the burden, a horrible truth emerges: without a successor, Gndul AND all souls she ever collected will fade into oblivion. Thousands of warriors erased. But accepting means YOU become the psychopomp, unable to rest until YOU find a successor. Choose: your peace or theirs?

branches.choice: Accept the eternal burden and become Death's guide
Find another way to preserve the souls without the burden

side.name: Reborn in Glory
side.title: Reborn in Glory
side.description: You accept Gndul's mantle. Wings of pure valiance burst from your shoulders. You return to life with dominion over heroic deaths. Immediately, Ragnarok acceleratescountless heroes die daily, and only YOU can guide them. The burden is crushing, eternal, and you chose it. This is honor's ultimate price.

side.name: The Soul Anchor
side.title: The Soul Anchor
side.description: You reject the burden and seek alternatives. Using forbidden magic, you anchor all of Gndul's collected souls to Valhalla itself, letting HER finally rest. But this changes Valhalla's natureit becomes a true afterlife, ending the endless battle. The Einherjar are finally at peace, but unprepared for Ragnarok. Your mercy may doom them.

dungeons.name: Helheim's Gate
dungeons.description: The entrance to the realm of the dishonored dead. Hel, daughter of Loki, rules this frozen wasteland where souls who died without glory wander eternally.

dungeons.name: Muspelheim Inferno
dungeons.description: A realm of endless fire and lava where the fire giants forge weapons of destruction. Surtr's champion guards the volcanic heart of this burning world.

dungeons.name: Niflheim Depths
dungeons.description: The primordial world of ice and mist, birthplace of frost and darkness. A massive frost wyrm, descendant of Jormungandr, has made its lair in the deepest glacial caverns.

dungeons.name: Valhalla's Trial
dungeons.description: The ultimate proving ground where only warriors worthy of Odin's halls may enter. Face the Einherjar Warlord, an immortal champion who has never tasted defeat.

dungeons.name: The Dark Elf Citadel
dungeons.description: The shadowy fortress of Svartalfheim where dark elves practice forbidden magic. Malekith the Cursed, ancient ruler of the dark elves, corrupts reality itself within these obsidian walls.

dungeons.name: The Eternal Forge
dungeons.description: The legendary forge of Nidavellir where the dwarves created Mjolnir and Gungnir. An ancient construct, powered by a dying star, guards the secrets of divine weaponcraft.

dungeons.name: Yggdrasil's Crown
dungeons.description: The highest branches of the World Tree where cosmic eagles soar. Ratatoskr, the treacherous squirrel, has grown corrupted by forbidden knowledge and now threatens to sever the tree's connection to the Nine Realms.

boss_hel_death_goddess.name: Hel, Goddess of Death
boss_hel_death_goddess.description: The half-living, half-dead daughter of Loki who rules over Helheim. Her touch brings eternal frost and her gaze strips away the will to fight.

boss_surtrs_champion.name: Surtr's Champion
boss_surtrs_champion.description: A towering fire giant wielding a blade forged from the heart of a volcano. His every strike ignites the air itself and his armor radiates deadly heat.

boss_frost_wyrm.name: Frost Wyrm Jormungandr
boss_frost_wyrm.description: A colossal serpent spawned from the World Serpent's essence. Its icy breath can freeze entire armies and its scales deflect even the mightiest weapons.

boss_einherjar_warlord.name: Einherjar Warlord
boss_einherjar_warlord.description: An immortal warrior who has fought in Valhalla for a thousand years. Each death in battle only makes him stronger, and he wields the combined techniques of countless fallen heroes.

boss_malekith_cursed.name: Malekith the Cursed
boss_malekith_cursed.description: Ancient king of the dark elves who mastered reality-warping magic. He can phase between dimensions, summon shadow constructs, and corrupt the very fabric of existence.

boss_forge_construct.name: Sindri's Construct
boss_forge_construct.description: A titanic automaton forged by the master dwarf Sindri, powered by a fragment of a dying star. It wields divine smithing tools as devastating weapons and its core erupts with stellar fire.

boss_ratatoskr_treacherous.name: Ratatoskr the Treacherous
boss_ratatoskr_treacherous.description: The cosmic messenger squirrel corrupted by forbidden knowledge from across the Nine Realms. Now massive and twisted, it commands reality-bending powers and seeks to collapse Yggdrasil itself.

q_asgard_main_01.name: Ascension to Asgard
q_asgard_main_01.title: Ascension to Asgard
q_asgard_main_01.description: You've been chosen by the All-Father to ascend to Asgard, realm of the gods.

q_asgard_main_02.name: Trial of Valor
q_asgard_main_02.title: Trial of Valor
q_asgard_main_02.description: Prove your worth to the Einherjar by completing the Trial of Valor - an ancient test of strength and courage.

q_asgard_main_03.name: Frost Giant Invasion
q_asgard_main_03.title: Frost Giant Invasion
q_asgard_main_03.description: Jotunheim's frost giants are marching on Asgard! Defend the Rainbow Bridge and push back the invasion.

q_asgard_main_04.name: The Stolen Relic
q_asgard_main_04.title: The Stolen Relic
q_asgard_main_04.description: Loki has stolen a powerful artifact from Odin's vault! Track him down through the Nine Realms and retrieve it.

q_asgard_main_05.name: Valhalla's Call
q_asgard_main_05.title: Valhalla's Call
q_asgard_main_05.description: The gates of Valhalla open only to the greatest warriors. Complete legendary feats to earn your place among the honored dead.

q_asgard_main_06.name: Ragnarok Approaches
q_asgard_main_06.title: Ragnarok Approaches
q_asgard_main_06.description: Prophecies speak of the end times. Gather the legendary heroes of old to prepare for the final battle.

q_asgard_main_07.name: The Final Battle
q_asgard_main_07.title: The Final Battle
q_asgard_main_07.description: Ragnarok is upon us! Lead the armies of Asgard against Surtr and his fire giants in the battle that will reshape the Nine Realms.

q_asgard_side_01.name: Mead Hall Brawl
q_asgard_side_01.title: Mead Hall Brawl
q_asgard_side_01.description: Earn the respect of Asgard's warriors by winning a tavern brawl against the toughest Einherjar.

q_asgard_side_02.name: Yggdrasil's Blessing
q_asgard_side_02.title: Yggdrasil's Blessing
q_asgard_side_02.description: The World Tree needs tending. Gather sacred water from the Well of Urd to nourish its roots.

q_asgard_side_03.name: Heimdall's Watch
q_asgard_side_03.title: Heimdall's Watch
q_asgard_side_03.description: Assist Heimdall in monitoring threats from the other realms by investigating suspicious magical signatures.

q_asgard_side_04.name: The Valkyries' Test
q_asgard_side_04.title: The Valkyries' Test
q_asgard_side_04.description: A Valkyrie challenges you to prove your mettle. Complete her combat trials to earn divine favor.

q_asgard_side_05.name: Dwarven Master craft
q_asgard_side_05.title: Dwarven Mastercraft
q_asgard_side_05.description: The dwarves of Svartalfheim need rare ores. Mine Uru metal from the depths of Nidavellir.

q_asgard_side_06.name: Fenrir's Binding
q_asgard_side_06.title: Fenrir's Binding
q_asgard_side_06.description: The great wolf Fenrir has broken free! Help the gods forge new chains to bind the beast.

q_asgard_side_07.name: Light Elf Alliance
q_asgard_side_07.title: Light Elf Alliance
q_asgard_side_07.description: Negotiate with the Light Elves of Alfheim to secure their aid in the coming war.

q_asgard_side_08.name: Midgard Serpent Sighting
q_asgard_side_08.title: Midgard Serpent Sighting
q_asgard_side_08.description: Jormungandr has been spotted near the shores. Investigate before the World Serpent brings catastrophe.

q_asgard_side_09.name: Bifrost Repairs
q_asgard_side_09.title: Bifrost Repairs
q_asgard_side_09.description: The Rainbow Bridge has sustained damage from battles. Gather cosmic crystals to repair its structure.

q_asgard_side_10.name: Odin's Ravens
q_asgard_side_10.title: Odin's Ravens
q_asgard_side_10.description: Huginn and Muninn have gone missing. Search the Nine Realms for the All-Father's prized companions.

q_asgard_side_11.name: Skadi's Hunt
q_asgard_side_11.title: Skadi's Hunt
q_asgard_side_11.description: The goddess of winter challenges you to a hunt. Track and slay the legendary Ice Drake.

q_asgard_side_12.name: Mimir's Wisdom
q_asgard_side_12.title: Mimir's Wisdom
q_asgard_side_12.description: Seek counsel from Mimir's head at the Well of Wisdom. Solve his three riddles to gain forbidden knowledge.

q_asgard_side_13.name: Thor's Hammer Hunt
q_asgard_side_13.title: Thor's Hammer Hunt
q_asgard_side_13.description: Thor has misplaced Mjolnir again! Help him retrace his steps through last night's feast.

q_asgard_side_14.name: Freya's Garden
q_asgard_side_14.title: Freya's Garden
q_asgard_side_14.description: Goddess Freya's sacred garden has been defiled by dark magic. Cleanse the corruption and restore its beauty.

q_asgard_side_15.name: The Norns' Prophecy
q_asgard_side_15.title: The Norns' Prophecy
q_asgard_side_15.description: The three fates have a message for you. Journey to their sacred grove and hear your destiny.

q_asgard_side_16.name: Loki's Gambit
q_asgard_side_16.title: Loki's Gambit
q_asgard_side_16.description: Loki approaches with a suspicious offer: help him retrieve a stolen artifact, or report his schemes to Odin. Your choice will have lasting consequences.

branches.choice: Help Loki with his scheme
Report Loki to Odin

q_asgard_side_16a.name: Trickster's Reward
q_asgard_side_16a.title: Trickster's Reward
q_asgard_side_16a.description: You aided Loki in retrieving the artifact from dark elf vaults. He reveals the item holds power over time itself. Now you must decide its fate.

q_asgard_side_16b.name: Odin's Trust
q_asgard_side_16b.title: Odin's Trust
q_asgard_side_16b.description: Odin commends your loyalty and sends you to stop Loki's plan. Infiltrate the dark elf citadel and destroy the artifact before Loki can claim it.

q_asgard_side_17.name: The Einherjar's Dilemma
q_asgard_side_17.title: The Einherjar's Dilemma
q_asgard_side_17.description: A legendary Einherjar warrior challenges the old ways of Valhalla. Side with tradition and duel him, or support his call for change and face the conservative faction.

branches.choice: Defend the ancient traditions
Support the call for change

q_asgard_side_17a.name: Champion of the Old Ways
q_asgard_side_17a.title: Champion of the Old Ways
q_asgard_side_17a.description: You defeated the rebel Einherjar in honorable combat. The traditional warriors celebrate you as their champion, but whispers of discontent remain. Navigate the political aftermath.

q_asgard_side_17b.name: Revolutionary Alliance
q_asgard_side_17b.title: Revolutionary Alliance
q_asgard_side_17b.description: You stand with the reformers against hidebound tradition. Lead a desperate defense when conservative warriors attack. Victory will reshape Valhalla's future forever.

q_asgard_side_18.name: The Vanir Emissary
q_asgard_side_18.title: The Vanir Emissary
q_asgard_side_18.description: A Vanir emissary arrives with urgent news: their realm faces annihilation from an unknown threat. Convince the Aesir to aid their ancient rivals, or let old grudges decide their fate.

branches.choice: Advocate for helping the Vanir
Refuse to intervene in Vanir affairs

q_asgard_side_18a.name: United Realms
q_asgard_side_18a.title: United Realms
q_asgard_side_18a.description: You convinced the gods to aid the Vanir. Journey to their realm and discover the threat: an ancient primordial force awakening. Unite Aesir and Vanir forces to seal it away.

q_asgard_side_18b.name: Aesir Supremacy
q_asgard_side_18b.title: Aesir Supremacy
q_asgard_side_18b.description: The Aesir refused to help, and Vanaheim has fallen. Now the same primordial threat turns its gaze to Asgard. Defend against an enemy empowered by consuming an entire realm.

q_asgard_side_19.name: Heimdall's Successor
q_asgard_side_19.title: Heimdall's Successor
q_asgard_side_19.description: Heimdall speaks of retirement and seeks a successor to guard the Bifrost. Prove your worthiness through trials, or recommend another and shape Asgard's future guardian.

branches.choice: Accept the trials to become guardian
Recommend another worthy candidate

q_asgard_side_19a.name: Guardian of the Bridge
q_asgard_side_19a.title: Guardian of the Bridge
q_asgard_side_19a.description: You underwent Heimdall's trials: eternal vigilance, perfect sight, and unwavering resolve. Now defend the Bifrost against a massive assault to prove you're worthy of the post.

q_asgard_side_19b.name: Kingmaker's Choice
q_asgard_side_19b.title: Kingmaker's Choice
q_asgard_side_19b.description: You recommended a warrior named Skjold for the position. When assassins target him before his inauguration, protect your candidate and uncover a conspiracy reaching into Odin's court.

q_asgard_side_20.name: The Dwarf King's Debt
q_asgard_side_20.title: The Dwarf King's Debt
q_asgard_side_20.description: The Dwarf King owes you a favor but can only forge one legendary item: a weapon that ensures victory in battle, or armor that grants immortality. Choose wisely.

branches.choice: Request the weapon of absolute victory
Request the armor of immortality

q_asgard_side_20a.name: Tyrfing's Curse
q_asgard_side_20a.title: Tyrfing's Curse
q_asgard_side_20a.description: The weapon grants victory but demands a terrible price: it must taste blood each time drawn. When it accidentally kills an innocent, break the curse by venturing into the forge's heart.

q_asgard_side_20b.name: The Deathless Burden
q_asgard_side_20b.title: The Deathless Burden
q_asgard_side_20b.description: The armor grants immortality but binds you to Asgard eternally. When Ragnarok begins, you cannot die but must watch others fall. Find a way to share the blessing with fallen comrades.

q_asgard_side_21.name: Yggdrasil's Keeper
q_asgard_side_21.title: Yggdrasil's Keeper
q_asgard_side_21.description: Ratatoskr reveals the World Tree's roots are dying from an unknown blight. Investigate three potential sources: dark elf magic, primordial corruption, or Nidhogg's influence. Choose your path.

branches.choice: Investigate the dark elf connection
Seek the primordial source
Confront Nidhogg directly

q_asgard_side_21a.name: Shadow Magic Unveiled
q_asgard_side_21a.title: Shadow Magic Unveiled
q_asgard_side_21a.description: You discovered dark elves channeling void magic into Yggdrasil's roots. They claim they're trying to save it, not destroy it. Trust their desperate plan or eliminate the threat.

q_asgard_side_21b.name: The First Disease
q_asgard_side_21b.title: The First Disease
q_asgard_side_21b.description: You traced the blight to Ginnungagap, the primordial void. An ancient entity claims Yggdrasil stole its essence to live. Negotiate a treaty or banish it back to oblivion.

q_asgard_side_21c.name: The Serpent's Truth
q_asgard_side_21c.title: The Serpent's Truth
q_asgard_side_21c.description: Nidhogg reveals he gnaws the roots to prune disease, not cause it. The real threat lies in Yggdrasil's crown. Rush to the tree's peak and face the corruption's true source.

q_asgard_side_22.name: The Forgotten God
q_asgard_side_22.title: The Forgotten God
q_asgard_side_22.description: You discover a sealed chamber containing a forgotten god, erased from history for unknown crimes. Free them and learn forbidden truths, or keep them imprisoned to maintain cosmic order.

branches.choice: Free the forgotten god
Reinforce the prison seals

q_asgard_side_22a.name: Truth Unbound
q_asgard_side_22a.title: Truth Unbound
q_asgard_side_22a.description: The freed god reveals they were imprisoned for trying to prevent Ragnarok. They offer to rewrite fate itself, but doing so might erase your existence. Choose your reality.

q_asgard_side_22b.name: Order Preserved
q_asgard_side_22b.title: Order Preserved
q_asgard_side_22b.description: You strengthened the seals, but the god's warnings haunt you. When their predictions start coming true, race against time to find another way to alter fate without unleashing chaos.

q_asgard_side_23.name: The Final Valkyrie
q_asgard_side_23.title: The Final Valkyrie
q_asgard_side_23.description: The last living Valkyrie from the Age of Heroes seeks one final warrior to bring to Valhalla before she fades. She's chosen you, but accepting means an honorable death. Decide your fate.

branches.choice: Accept the valiant death and rebirth
Refuse and find another worthy soul

q_asgard_side_23a.name: Reborn in Glory
q_asgard_side_23a.title: Reborn in Glory
q_asgard_side_23a.description: You died a hero's death and returned stronger than before. The Valkyrie's essence merged with yours, granting you the power to ferry souls yourself. Your legend is eternal.

q_asgard_side_23b.name: The Final Mercy
q_asgard_side_23b.title: The Final Mercy
q_asgard_side_23b.description: You found another hero worthy of Valhalla. As they ascend and the Valkyrie fades, she grants you her remaining power. Bear the burden of choosing who deserves glory.

q_asgard_side_16_step1.name: Trail of Lies
q_asgard_side_16_step1.title: Trail of Lies
q_asgard_side_16_step1.description: Following Loki's directions, you journey to Svartalfheim. Dark elf scouts attack on sight, claiming YOU stole from THEM. Fight through their ambush and capture one for questioning.

q_asgard_side_16_step2.name: The Dark Truth
q_asgard_side_16_step2.title: The Dark Truth
q_asgard_side_16_step2.description: The captured elf reveals Loki stole the artifact from THEM firsta chronos shard capable of rewriting recent history. Now both sides want it. Infiltrate the dark elf vault where it's supposedly hidden.

q_asgard_side_16_step3.name: Vault of Shadows
q_asgard_side_16_step3.title: Vault of Shadows
q_asgard_side_16_step3.description: Deep in the vault, you face the Shadow Wardena construct designed to kill thieves. Defeat it and claim the chronos shard, but Loki appears the moment you touch it. He reveals his TRUE plan.

q_asgard_side_16_choice.name: The Moment of Truth
q_asgard_side_16_choice.title: The Moment of Truth
q_asgard_side_16_choice.description: Loki admits he wants to undo Baldur's deathto rewrite the moment that started his exile. If he succeeds, Ragnarok might be prevented... or accelerated. Trust the trickster's redemption, or report everything to Odin?

branches.choice: Help Loki rewrite history
Report Loki to Odin immediately

q_asgard_side_17_step1.name: Voices of Discord
q_asgard_side_17_step1.title: Voices of Discord
q_asgard_side_17_step1.description: Interview three legendary Einherjar: a conservative champion, a moderate warrior, and Bjorn himself. Each presents compelling arguments. Fight alongside each in training to understand their perspectives before taking a side.

q_asgard_side_17_step2.name: The Ancient Texts
q_asgard_side_17_step2.title: The Ancient Texts
q_asgard_side_17_step2.description: Research in Odin's library reveals prophecies: 'Those who fight as individuals fall as individuals. Unity forged in change shall weather the storm.' But traditionalists claim these texts are forgeries planted by Bjorn. Expose the truth.

q_asgard_side_17_step3.name: Midnight Duel
q_asgard_side_17_step3.title: Midnight Duel
q_asgard_side_17_step3.description: The conservative faction challenges Bjorn to trial by combatyou must represent one side. If you fight FOR tradition, face Bjorn and three reformers. If you fight FOR change, duel the conservative champion and his honor guard.

branches.choice: Defend tradition against Bjorn
Fight alongside Bjorn for change

q_asgard_side_18_step1.name: Peace Treaty Inspection
q_asgard_side_18_step1.title: Peace Treaty Inspection
q_asgard_side_18_step1.description: Travel to the Aesir-Vanir border to verify Skadi's claims. You discover frost giant scoutsbut also Vanir soldiers secretly mining near Asgard's territory. Is this invasion prep or resource desperation? Interrogate captured scouts from both sides.

q_asgard_side_18_step2.name: Hidden Agendas
q_asgard_side_18_step2.title: Hidden Agendas
q_asgard_side_18_step2.description: Evidence suggests BOTH sides are hiding something. Vanir mine rare metals for weapons, while Aesir scouts provoked some giant attacks. Meanwhile, giants mass at BOTH borders. Confront Skadi or Thor with what you've learned.

q_asgard_side_18_step3.name: The Giant King's Message
q_asgard_side_18_step3.title: The Giant King's Message
q_asgard_side_18_step3.description: You capture a frost giant general who reveals the truth: HE sent Skadi because both god-realms ignored his peace proposals. Now his patience is spent. Fight your way through his war camp to reach his throne and hear his demands directly.

branches.choice: Broker peace between all three races
Unite Aesir and Vanir against the giants

q_asgard_side_19_step1.name: Eyes That Pierce Realms
q_asgard_side_19_step1.title: Eyes That Pierce Realms
q_asgard_side_19_step1.description: Heimdall grants you temporary access to his sight. You see across all nine realms simultaneouslyit's overwhelming. Focus through the chaos to identify 12 hidden threats: assassins, invaders, and dimensional rifts. Miss even one and the trial fails.

q_asgard_side_19_step2.name: The Sleepless Vigil
q_asgard_side_19_step2.title: The Sleepless Vigil
q_asgard_side_19_step2.description: Guard Bifrost for 72 hours without restHeimdall's standard. Waves of enemies test your endurance: dark elves, fire giants, and finally a massive elder wyrm. But the worst threat comes on hour 71 when sleep deprivation causes hallucinations. Trust nothing.

q_asgard_side_19_step3.name: The Shadow Heimdall Sees
q_asgard_side_19_step3.title: The Shadow Heimdall Sees
q_asgard_side_19_step3.description: You passed the trials, but Heimdall reveals why he seeks a replacement: he's foreseen his own death. An entity called the Void Walker phases between realms, invisible even to him. It comes to destroy Bifrost and isolate the realms. Together, hunt this horror.

branches.choice: Accept guardianship and face the Void Walker alone
Fight alongside Heimdall against destiny

q_asgard_side_20_step1.name: The Dying Forge
q_asgard_side_20_step1.title: The Dying Forge
q_asgard_side_20_step1.description: Journey deep into Nidavellir. The great forges dim as dwarven craftsmanship fades. Brokkr reveals his brother Eitri stole the primordial ember in a jealous rage, claiming he should be king. Find Eitri's hidden workshop and investigate his true motives.

q_asgard_side_20_step2.name: Brother's Betrayal
q_asgard_side_20_step2.title: Brother's Betrayal
q_asgard_side_20_step2.description: Eitri didn't steal the emberhe's trying to PURIFY it. The ember was corrupted by fire giant magic, and using it would doom whoever wields the forged item. Fight through fire giant assassins who want the ember kept corrupted. Reclaim it for purification.

q_asgard_side_20_step3.name: Choice of Legends
q_asgard_side_20_step3.title: Choice of Legends
q_asgard_side_20_step3.description: With the ember purified, the forge blazes. Brokkr apologizes to Eitrifamily reconciled. Now they can forge your legend, but they present a dilemma: forge a weapon that ensures victory but draws enemies to you forever, or armor granting immortality but binding you to Asgard eternally.

branches.choice: Request the weapon of absolute victory
Request the armor of immortality

q_asgard_side_21_step1.name: The Three Investigations
q_asgard_side_21_step1.title: The Three Investigations
q_asgard_side_21_step1.description: Gather evidence at three locations: Svartalfheim for dark elf intel, Ginnungagap's edge for primordial traces, and Nidhogg's lair for the dragon's activities. Each location is deadly. But at each site, you find something impossible: YOUR OWN FOOTPRINTS from the future.

q_asgard_side_21_step2.name: Time's Cruel Loop
q_asgard_side_21_step2.title: Time's Cruel Loop
q_asgard_side_21_step2.description: The evidence reveals horrifying truth: YOU cause the blight, but in a future timeline. Dark elves show you visionsyou'll HAVE TO poison Yggdrasil to stop something worse: a parasitic entity called the World Devourer currently gestating in the tree's heart. Kill the host, kill the parasite.

q_asgard_side_21_step3.name: The Impossible Choice
q_asgard_side_21_step3.title: The Impossible Choice
q_asgard_side_21_step3.description: Confront the World Devourer inside Yggdrasil's heart. It's already awake. Three paths emerge: poison the tree NOW to weaken it before it escapes (dark elf method), try to surgically extract it using primordial magic (risky experimental), or make a deal with Nidhogg who claims he can devour it.

branches.choice: Poison Yggdrasil to weaken the Devourer
Use primordial magic to extract it
Bargain with Nidhogg the dragon

q_asgard_side_22_step1.name: The Silent Screams
q_asgard_side_22_step1.title: The Silent Screams
q_asgard_side_22_step1.description: Using forbidden magic, you briefly connect to the god's mind. Instant agonythey've experienced every second of imprisonment, unable to sleep or forget. They show you memories: they were Baldr's twin, erased because they foresaw and tried to prevent Ragnarok by killing Baldr first.

q_asgard_side_22_step2.name: Odin's Secret
q_asgard_side_22_step2.title: Odin's Secret
q_asgard_side_22_step2.description: Confront Odin. He admits the truth: the forgotten god, Varr's true name, tried to kill Baldr to save everyone. Odin chose sentiment over survival and erased them. Now Ragnarok looms anyway. Odin asks you: was he right to value his son's life over the realm's future?

q_asgard_side_22_step3.name: The Breaking Point
q_asgard_side_22_step3.title: The Breaking Point
q_asgard_side_22_step3.description: Return to the chamber. The seals weaken from your investigation. The forgotten god can almost speak. They offer a bargain: free them and they'll stop Ragnarok using knowledge from their visions. But doing so might erase Baldr's legacy entirely. Reinforce the seals or break them?

branches.choice: Free the forgotten god and prevent Ragnarok
Reinforce the seals and honor Odin's choice

q_asgard_side_23_step1.name: The Impossible Trial
q_asgard_side_23_step1.title: The Impossible Trial
q_asgard_side_23_step1.description: Gndul explains: to die gloriously, you must face impossible odds and fall in combat against a legendary foe. She transports you to challenge Ymir's Echoa manifestation of the first being's power. This is MEANT to kill you. Fight knowing death is the victory condition.

q_asgard_side_23_step2.name: Death and Rebirth
q_asgard_side_23_step2.title: Death and Rebirth
q_asgard_side_23_step2.description: You fall in legendary combat. Your spirit rises to Valhalla, where Gndul waits. She offers her essenceimmortality, power over death, the ability to guide heroes. But then you see the cost: she's been TRAPPED, unable to truly die for millennia. Do you accept this eternal burden or reject it?

q_asgard_side_23_step3.name: The Burden of Wings
q_asgard_side_23_step3.title: The Burden of Wings
q_asgard_side_23_step3.description: If you reject the burden, a horrible truth emerges: without a successor, Gndul AND all souls she ever collected will fade into oblivion. Thousands of warriors erased. But accepting means YOU become the psychopomp, unable to rest until YOU find a successor. Choose: your peace or theirs?

branches.choice: Accept the eternal burden and become Death's guide
Find another way to preserve the souls without the burden

q_asgard_main_03_step1.name: Bridge Skirmish
q_asgard_main_03_step1.title: Bridge Skirmish
q_asgard_main_03_step1.description: The first wave crashes into the Bifrost. Defeat the frost giant vanguard and secure the bridgehead.

q_asgard_main_03_choice.name: Storm or Shield
q_asgard_main_03_choice.title: Storm or Shield
q_asgard_main_03_choice.description: Heimdall gives you two options: pursue the retreating giants into the storm, or fortify the bridge against a second wave.

branches.choice: Pursue the retreating giants
Fortify the bridge

q_asgard_main_03a.name: Icebound Pursuit
q_asgard_main_03a.title: Icebound Pursuit
q_asgard_main_03a.description: Chase the giants into the blizzard and defeat their warleader before they regroup.

q_asgard_main_03b.name: Bridge of Aegis
q_asgard_main_03b.title: Bridge of Aegis
q_asgard_main_03b.description: Reinforce the Bifrost wards with Heimdall and repel the second wave of giants.

q_asgard_side_12_step1.name: Well of Echoes
q_asgard_side_12_step1.title: Well of Echoes
q_asgard_side_12_step1.description: Answer Mimir's first riddle and retrieve a rune from the well's depths guarded by spirits.

q_asgard_side_12_choice.name: The Price of Wisdom
q_asgard_side_12_choice.title: The Price of Wisdom
q_asgard_side_12_choice.description: Mimir demands payment: a memory of your past or a relic from your travels. Choose your tribute.

branches.choice: Trade a cherished memory
Offer a relic

q_asgard_side_12a.name: Memory's Weight
q_asgard_side_12a.title: Memory's Weight
q_asgard_side_12a.description: Relive a painful moment and surrender its memory. Mimir grants a final riddle and blessing.

q_asgard_side_12b.name: Relic of the Past
q_asgard_side_12b.title: Relic of the Past
q_asgard_side_12b.description: Offer a relic and defend the well from greedy spirits drawn to its power.

q_asgard_side_13_step1.name: Feast Hall Clues
q_asgard_side_13_step1.title: Feast Hall Clues
q_asgard_side_13_step1.description: Question the Einherjar and calm a rowdy brawl to piece together where Mjolnir went.

q_asgard_side_13_choice.name: Two Trails
q_asgard_side_13_choice.title: Two Trails
q_asgard_side_13_choice.description: The trail splits: Heimdall saw a flash at the bridge, while Loki hints at a prank in the forge. Choose a lead.

branches.choice: Ask Heimdall at the Bifrost
Follow Loki to the forge

q_asgard_side_13a.name: Bifrost Glint
q_asgard_side_13a.title: Bifrost Glint
q_asgard_side_13a.description: Heimdall reveals a thief fled across the bridge. Defeat the runner and reclaim Mjolnir.

q_asgard_side_13b.name: Forge of Pranks
q_asgard_side_13b.title: Forge of Pranks
q_asgard_side_13b.description: Loki's prank backfires and a magma sprite runs off with Mjolnir. Chase it down in the forge tunnels.

q_asgard_main_01_step1.name: Bifrost Oath
q_asgard_main_01_step1.title: Bifrost Oath
q_asgard_main_01_step1.description: Heimdall requires a vow before you step onto the bridge. Speak your oath and face a brief trial of intent.

q_asgard_main_01_step2.name: Hall of Echoes
q_asgard_main_01_step2.title: Hall of Echoes
q_asgard_main_01_step2.description: You walk the halls where legends are sung. Earn the respect of the Einherjar and learn the laws of Asgard.

q_asgard_main_01_step3.name: Seat Among Gods
q_asgard_main_01_step3.title: Seat Among Gods
q_asgard_main_01_step3.description: Odin grants you a place in the high hall. Your first charge is to stand as Asgard's shield.

q_asgard_main_02_step1.name: Trial of Steel
q_asgard_main_02_step1.title: Trial of Steel
q_asgard_main_02_step1.description: Enter the arena of Valhalla and face the first round of challengers to prove your skill.

q_asgard_main_02_step2.name: Trial of Resolve
q_asgard_main_02_step2.title: Trial of Resolve
q_asgard_main_02_step2.description: Hold the shield wall against relentless waves. The trial measures courage more than strength.

q_asgard_main_02_choice.name: Trial of Valor
q_asgard_main_02_choice.title: Trial of Valor
q_asgard_main_02_choice.description: The final challenge is yours to choose: mercy in the face of danger, or fury against the mightiest foe.

branches.choice: Protect the wounded under heavy fire
Hunt the champion of the arena

q_asgard_main_02a.name: Valor's Mercy
q_asgard_main_02a.title: Valor's Mercy
q_asgard_main_02a.description: You shield the fallen and carry them to safety. The hall cheers for a warrior who values life.

q_asgard_main_02b.name: Valor's Fury
q_asgard_main_02b.title: Valor's Fury
q_asgard_main_02b.description: You clash with the arena champion in a duel that shakes the rafters. The Einherjar salute your fearlessness.

q_asgard_main_03_step2.name: Bifrost Breach
q_asgard_main_03_step2.title: Bifrost Breach
q_asgard_main_03_step2.description: A second squad pushes through the storm and damages the bridge wards. Repair them before the route collapses.

q_asgard_main_04_step1.name: Mask and Tracks
q_asgard_main_04_step1.title: Mask and Tracks
q_asgard_main_04_step1.description: Loki's trail is baited with false clues. Follow the subtle markers only a trickster would use.

q_asgard_main_04_step2.name: Shadows of Svartalfheim
q_asgard_main_04_step2.title: Shadows of Svartalfheim
q_asgard_main_04_step2.description: The relic's aura leads into the dark elf tunnels. Navigate traps and decipher a stolen rune map.

q_asgard_main_04_choice.name: Forked Trail
q_asgard_main_04_choice.title: Forked Trail
q_asgard_main_04_choice.description: You corner Loki's illusion. He offers two routes: chase him into Helheim, or return to Odin with proof and set a trap.

branches.choice: Pursue Loki into Helheim
Return to Odin and set a counter trap

q_asgard_main_04a.name: Helheim Chase
q_asgard_main_04a.title: Helheim Chase
q_asgard_main_04a.description: You race through the frozen veil and fight Loki's shades to seize the relic at the edge of Hel's throne.

q_asgard_main_04b.name: Odin's Snare
q_asgard_main_04b.title: Odin's Snare
q_asgard_main_04b.description: You and Odin weave a trap around the vault. Loki returns for the relic and is forced into a direct confrontation.

q_asgard_main_05_step1.name: Feats of the Living
q_asgard_main_05_step1.title: Feats of the Living
q_asgard_main_05_step1.description: Prove your worth in the living realm: save a village on Midgard and return with their oath of thanks.

q_asgard_main_05_step2.name: Feats of the Fallen
q_asgard_main_05_step2.title: Feats of the Fallen
q_asgard_main_05_step2.description: Stand with the Einherjar in a reenactment of their final battle and learn the cost of glory.

q_asgard_main_05_choice.name: Judgment of the Hall
q_asgard_main_05_choice.title: Judgment of the Hall
q_asgard_main_05_choice.description: The hall offers two paths to earn your seat. Choose the feat that matches your spirit.

branches.choice: Duel the champion of Valhalla
Rescue the fallen from a cursed field

q_asgard_main_05a.name: Champion's Duel
q_asgard_main_05a.title: Champion's Duel
