q_asgard_main_05a.description: You face Valhalla's champion in a duel judged by Odin's ravens. Win, and the gates open for you.

q_asgard_main_05b.name: Field of Echoes
q_asgard_main_05b.title: Field of Echoes
q_asgard_main_05b.description: You guide lost souls to Valhalla while fending off spirits that feed on regret.

q_asgard_main_06_step1.name: Signs in the Sky
q_asgard_main_06_step1.title: Signs in the Sky
q_asgard_main_06_step1.description: Read the omens in the skies of Asgard and report the patterns to the council.

q_asgard_main_06_step2.name: Call the Legends
q_asgard_main_06_step2.title: Call the Legends
q_asgard_main_06_step2.description: Seek the old heroes who doubt the prophecies. Convince them with deeds, not promises.

q_asgard_main_06_choice.name: Call to Arms
q_asgard_main_06_choice.title: Call to Arms
q_asgard_main_06_choice.description: Two factions answer the summons. Choose which force you will rally first.

branches.choice: Rally the Vanir warbands
Rally the Einherjar legions

q_asgard_main_06a.name: Vanir Muster
q_asgard_main_06a.title: Vanir Muster
q_asgard_main_06a.description: You win the Vanir by settling an old feud at the border. Their banners rise beside Asgard.

q_asgard_main_06b.name: Einherjar Muster
q_asgard_main_06b.title: Einherjar Muster
q_asgard_main_06b.description: You break a siege at Valhalla's gates and restore faith in the final stand.

q_asgard_main_07_step1.name: March to Vigrid
q_asgard_main_07_step1.title: March to Vigrid
q_asgard_main_07_step1.description: Lead the host to the battle plain. Hold formation as fire storms test the army's resolve.

q_asgard_main_07_step2.name: Clash at the Ford
q_asgard_main_07_step2.title: Clash at the Ford
q_asgard_main_07_step2.description: The river turns to steam as giants advance. You must break their line to reach Surtr.

q_asgard_main_07_choice.name: Fate of the Field
q_asgard_main_07_choice.title: Fate of the Field
q_asgard_main_07_choice.description: The battle hinges on your decision. Do you hold the line or strike directly at Surtr?

branches.choice: Hold the line and save the army
Lead a strike team against Surtr

q_asgard_main_07a.name: Shield of the Realms
q_asgard_main_07a.title: Shield of the Realms
q_asgard_main_07a.description: You hold the line as Surtr's giants crash. Asgard stands because you refused to break.

q_asgard_main_07b.name: Spear of Ragnarok
q_asgard_main_07b.title: Spear of Ragnarok
q_asgard_main_07b.description: You cut through the chaos and face Surtr's guard. The battle pivots on your daring assault.

q_asgard_side_01_step1.name: Broken Benches
q_asgard_side_01_step1.title: Broken Benches
q_asgard_side_01_step1.description: The brawl spills across the hall. Keep the fight fair and stop the worst offenders.

q_asgard_side_01_step2.name: Wager of Honor
q_asgard_side_01_step2.title: Wager of Honor
q_asgard_side_01_step2.description: A veteran Einherjar offers a wager: win their respect without humiliating the fallen.

q_asgard_side_01_choice.name: Mead Hall Brawl
q_asgard_side_01_choice.title: Mead Hall Brawl
q_asgard_side_01_choice.description: Choose how to end the brawl.

branches.choice: Win bare-handed to show restraint
Accept a formal duel with blunted steel

q_asgard_side_01a.name: Bare-Handed Honor
q_asgard_side_01a.title: Bare-Handed Honor
q_asgard_side_01a.description: You win without weapons, earning cheers for restraint and control.

q_asgard_side_01b.name: Blades of Respect
q_asgard_side_01b.title: Blades of Respect
q_asgard_side_01b.description: You accept a formal duel and prove your skill. The hall roars in approval.

q_asgard_side_02_step1.name: Well of Urd
q_asgard_side_02_step1.title: Well of Urd
q_asgard_side_02_step1.description: Reach the well's edge and collect the water without disturbing the Norns' threads.

q_asgard_side_02_step2.name: Rootsong Ritual
q_asgard_side_02_step2.title: Rootsong Ritual
q_asgard_side_02_step2.description: A ritual chant awakens the roots. The water must be poured at a perfect moment.

q_asgard_side_02_choice.name: Yggdrasil's Blessing
q_asgard_side_02_choice.title: Yggdrasil's Blessing
q_asgard_side_02_choice.description: Decide how the blessing spreads across the roots.

branches.choice: Pour the water directly into the deepest roots
Entrust the water to Ratatoskr to carry

q_asgard_side_02a.name: Deep Root Gift
q_asgard_side_02a.title: Deep Root Gift
q_asgard_side_02a.description: You steady the roots with the sacred water. Yggdrasil hums with new strength.

q_asgard_side_02b.name: Swift Branches
q_asgard_side_02b.title: Swift Branches
q_asgard_side_02b.description: Ratatoskr spreads the blessing swiftly, but you must fend off root spirits along the way.

q_asgard_side_03_step1.name: Watchtower Signals
q_asgard_side_03_step1.title: Watchtower Signals
q_asgard_side_03_step1.description: Track three strange flares across the realms and report which threaten Asgard.

q_asgard_side_03_step2.name: Shadow Trail
q_asgard_side_03_step2.title: Shadow Trail
q_asgard_side_03_step2.description: A suspicious trail leads to a hidden observer near the bridge. Follow without alerting them.

q_asgard_side_03_choice.name: Heimdall's Watch
q_asgard_side_03_choice.title: Heimdall's Watch
q_asgard_side_03_choice.description: How do you end the surveillance?

branches.choice: Confront the spy and demand answers
Set a trap and capture the spy

q_asgard_side_03a.name: Open Confrontation
q_asgard_side_03a.title: Open Confrontation
q_asgard_side_03a.description: You force the spy into the open and earn Heimdall's respect for bold action.

q_asgard_side_03b.name: Silent Capture
q_asgard_side_03b.title: Silent Capture
q_asgard_side_03b.description: Your trap closes perfectly. Heimdall praises your patience and precision.

q_asgard_side_04_step1.name: Skyborne Trial
q_asgard_side_04_step1.title: Skyborne Trial
q_asgard_side_04_step1.description: Ride with a Valkyrie to the clouds and face a midair ambush.

q_asgard_side_04_step2.name: Shield Wall
q_asgard_side_04_step2.title: Shield Wall
q_asgard_side_04_step2.description: Stand as the anchor of a shield wall against an overwhelming force.

q_asgard_side_04_choice.name: The Valkyries' Test
q_asgard_side_04_choice.title: The Valkyries' Test
q_asgard_side_04_choice.description: The Valkyries offer two final trials. Choose your path.

branches.choice: Protect the fallen during a retreat
Charge the enemy leader

q_asgard_side_04a.name: Guardian's Wing
q_asgard_side_04a.title: Guardian's Wing
q_asgard_side_04a.description: You cover the retreat and preserve lives. The Valkyries honor your protection.

q_asgard_side_04b.name: Sky Spear
q_asgard_side_04b.title: Sky Spear
q_asgard_side_04b.description: You pierce the enemy leadership and end the trial in a single bold strike.

q_asgard_side_05_step1.name: Nidavellir Descent
q_asgard_side_05_step1.title: Nidavellir Descent
q_asgard_side_05_step1.description: Enter the deep mines and learn the dwarven safety rites.

q_asgard_side_05_step2.name: Uru Vein
q_asgard_side_05_step2.title: Uru Vein
q_asgard_side_05_step2.description: Locate a rare Uru vein guarded by stone constructs and claim enough ore.

q_asgard_side_05_choice.name: Dwarven Mastercraft
q_asgard_side_05_choice.title: Dwarven Mastercraft
q_asgard_side_05_choice.description: The mine collapses. Choose what to save first.

branches.choice: Save the miners trapped behind the fall
Secure the ore and stabilize the tunnel

q_asgard_side_05a.name: Hammer of Mercy
q_asgard_side_05a.title: Hammer of Mercy
q_asgard_side_05a.description: You rescue the miners first. The dwarves praise your priorities and craft a small gift.

q_asgard_side_05b.name: Forge First
q_asgard_side_05b.title: Forge First
q_asgard_side_05b.description: You secure the ore and prevent a total collapse. The forges blaze brighter that night.

q_asgard_side_06_step1.name: Wolf's Trail
q_asgard_side_06_step1.title: Wolf's Trail
q_asgard_side_06_step1.description: Track Fenrir's prints across the icy fields before he vanishes into shadow.

q_asgard_side_06_step2.name: Forged Restraints
q_asgard_side_06_step2.title: Forged Restraints
q_asgard_side_06_step2.description: Work with the dwarves to craft a chain that can hold a god-beast.

q_asgard_side_06_choice.name: Fenrir's Binding
q_asgard_side_06_choice.title: Fenrir's Binding
q_asgard_side_06_choice.description: The plan demands a decision in the moment of capture.

branches.choice: Use rune magic to lull Fenrir
Use brute force and direct combat

q_asgard_side_06a.name: Runebound
q_asgard_side_06a.title: Runebound
q_asgard_side_06a.description: You calm the beast long enough to bind him. The gods nod at your restraint.

q_asgard_side_06b.name: Chainbreaker
q_asgard_side_06b.title: Chainbreaker
q_asgard_side_06b.description: You take Fenrir head-on and win a brutal clash to secure the bindings.

q_asgard_side_07_step1.name: Alfheim Court
q_asgard_side_07_step1.title: Alfheim Court
q_asgard_side_07_step1.description: Earn a hearing in the Light Elf court by resolving a border dispute.

q_asgard_side_07_step2.name: Brightwood Passage
q_asgard_side_07_step2.title: Brightwood Passage
q_asgard_side_07_step2.description: Escort the Light Elf envoy through a corrupted grove.

q_asgard_side_07_choice.name: Light Elf Alliance
q_asgard_side_07_choice.title: Light Elf Alliance
q_asgard_side_07_choice.description: Choose the terms of the alliance.

branches.choice: Offer Asgard military aid and shared defense
Offer autonomy and trade in exchange for support

q_asgard_side_07a.name: Shielded Alliance
q_asgard_side_07a.title: Shielded Alliance
q_asgard_side_07a.description: The Light Elves accept your military pact. Their archers pledge to fight beside Asgard.

q_asgard_side_07b.name: Free Alliance
q_asgard_side_07b.title: Free Alliance
q_asgard_side_07b.description: You secure a trade accord and a promise of aid without losing their independence.

q_asgard_side_08_step1.name: Coastline Recon
q_asgard_side_08_step1.title: Coastline Recon
q_asgard_side_08_step1.description: Survey the shoreline for signs of the serpent's passing.

q_asgard_side_08_step2.name: Deepwater Signs
q_asgard_side_08_step2.title: Deepwater Signs
q_asgard_side_08_step2.description: Dive into the cold waters to confirm whether Jormungandr is rising or only passing.

q_asgard_side_08_choice.name: Midgard Serpent Sighting
q_asgard_side_08_choice.title: Midgard Serpent Sighting
q_asgard_side_08_choice.description: Decide how to respond to the sighting.

branches.choice: Warn Asgard and rally defenses
Track the serpent alone to learn its path

q_asgard_side_08a.name: Shield the Shores
q_asgard_side_08a.title: Shield the Shores
q_asgard_side_08a.description: You fortify the shoreline and prevent panic. The coast is ready.

q_asgard_side_08b.name: Serpent's Path
q_asgard_side_08b.title: Serpent's Path
q_asgard_side_08b.description: You track the serpent's wake and return with knowledge of its route.

q_asgard_side_09_step1.name: Shard Hunt
q_asgard_side_09_step1.title: Shard Hunt
q_asgard_side_09_step1.description: Locate three cosmic crystals scattered across a storm-warped ridge.

q_asgard_side_09_step2.name: Weave the Light
q_asgard_side_09_step2.title: Weave the Light
q_asgard_side_09_step2.description: Help Heimdall set the shards into the bridge's weave.

q_asgard_side_09_choice.name: Bifrost Repairs
q_asgard_side_09_choice.title: Bifrost Repairs
q_asgard_side_09_choice.description: A final material is missing. Decide who to request aid from.

branches.choice: Ask the dwarves for precision metalwork
Ask the Vanir for living crystal sap

q_asgard_side_09a.name: Dwarven Lattice
q_asgard_side_09a.title: Dwarven Lattice
q_asgard_side_09a.description: Dwarven craft restores the bridge's strength. It shines like new.

q_asgard_side_09b.name: Vanir Bloom
q_asgard_side_09b.title: Vanir Bloom
q_asgard_side_09b.description: The Vanir provide living crystals that mend the bridge in a surge of light.

q_asgard_side_10_step1.name: Shadow Hunt
q_asgard_side_10_step1.title: Shadow Hunt
q_asgard_side_10_step1.description: Track scattered feathers and whispering signs across the realms.

q_asgard_side_10_step2.name: Whispers in Mist
q_asgard_side_10_step2.title: Whispers in Mist
q_asgard_side_10_step2.description: A fog of illusion hides the ravens. Use wisdom to discern which voices are real.

q_asgard_side_10_choice.name: Odin's Ravens
q_asgard_side_10_choice.title: Odin's Ravens
q_asgard_side_10_choice.description: Decide how to recover the ravens safely.

branches.choice: Trust the ravens and follow their call
Bind the ravens with a protective rune

q_asgard_side_10a.name: Call of Thought
q_asgard_side_10a.title: Call of Thought
q_asgard_side_10a.description: You follow the true call and guide the ravens home. Odin is pleased.

q_asgard_side_10b.name: Rune of Memory
q_asgard_side_10b.title: Rune of Memory
q_asgard_side_10b.description: You bind the ravens to safety and escort them home through the mist.

q_asgard_side_11_step1.name: Frozen Tracks
q_asgard_side_11_step1.title: Frozen Tracks
q_asgard_side_11_step1.description: Follow the drake's trail through a blizzard and survive the whiteout.

q_asgard_side_11_step2.name: Whiteout Ambush
q_asgard_side_11_step2.title: Whiteout Ambush
q_asgard_side_11_step2.description: The drake attacks from the fog. Hold your ground and keep Skadi safe.

q_asgard_side_11_choice.name: Skadi's Hunt
q_asgard_side_11_choice.title: Skadi's Hunt
q_asgard_side_11_choice.description: Choose your final approach to the hunt.

branches.choice: Go for the quick kill
Protect Skadi and wait for the opening

q_asgard_side_11a.name: Hunter's Mercy
q_asgard_side_11a.title: Hunter's Mercy
q_asgard_side_11a.description: You strike decisively and end the hunt. Skadi respects your resolve.

q_asgard_side_11b.name: Guardian of Winter
q_asgard_side_11b.title: Guardian of Winter
q_asgard_side_11b.description: You protect Skadi and finish the drake when the moment is right.

q_asgard_side_14_step1.name: Withered Roses
q_asgard_side_14_step1.title: Withered Roses
q_asgard_side_14_step1.description: Trace the corrupted petals to their source and repel the blight spirits.

q_asgard_side_14_step2.name: Heart of Thorns
q_asgard_side_14_step2.title: Heart of Thorns
q_asgard_side_14_step2.description: A thorned core grows beneath the garden. Confront it before it spreads.

q_asgard_side_14_choice.name: Freya's Garden
q_asgard_side_14_choice.title: Freya's Garden
q_asgard_side_14_choice.description: Choose how to cleanse the heart of the garden.

branches.choice: Cleanse with light and patience
Cut out the corruption quickly

q_asgard_side_14a.name: Bloom Restored
q_asgard_side_14a.title: Bloom Restored
q_asgard_side_14a.description: You restore the garden without harming its spirit. Freya thanks you with a smile.

q_asgard_side_14b.name: Thorned Sacrifice
q_asgard_side_14b.title: Thorned Sacrifice
q_asgard_side_14b.description: You cut out the corruption, saving the garden at the cost of rare blooms.

q_asgard_side_15_step1.name: Thread of Fate
q_asgard_side_15_step1.title: Thread of Fate
q_asgard_side_15_step1.description: Follow a shimmering thread across the roots of Yggdrasil to reach the grove.

q_asgard_side_15_step2.name: Three Questions
q_asgard_side_15_step2.title: Three Questions
q_asgard_side_15_step2.description: The Norns ask three questions that test your will more than your strength.

q_asgard_side_15_choice.name: The Norns' Prophecy
q_asgard_side_15_choice.title: The Norns' Prophecy
q_asgard_side_15_choice.description: Will you accept the prophecy or defy it?

branches.choice: Accept the prophecy and prepare
Defy the prophecy and seek a new path

q_asgard_side_15a.name: Woven Destiny
q_asgard_side_15a.title: Woven Destiny
q_asgard_side_15a.description: You accept the Norns' words and gain clarity for the trials ahead.

q_asgard_side_15b.name: Broken Thread
q_asgard_side_15b.title: Broken Thread
q_asgard_side_15b.description: You defy fate and forge your own path. The Norns watch in silence.

main.name: Mistbound Arrival
main.title: Mistbound Arrival
main.description: You cross the rim of Niflheim where the fog bites like teeth. A pale trail of rune-ice marks the only safe path forward.

main.name: Frostbitten Path
main.title: Frostbitten Path
main.description: Follow the rune-ice and clear the wraiths that drift through the frost mist.

main.name: Echoes in the Ice
main.title: Echoes in the Ice
main.description: Ancient voices whisper within frozen walls. Seek the source of the echo and learn who guides the mist.

main.name: Fork in the Fog
main.title: Fork in the Fog
main.description: Two paths open in the rime: one tracked by a frost wyrm, the other lined with shattered shrines.

branches.choice: Follow the wyrm tracks
Investigate the broken shrines

main.name: Wyrmtrack
main.title: Wyrmtrack
main.description: The trail leads to a nest of rime-scaled serpents. Drive them off and claim their hoard.

main.name: Frozen Reliquary
main.title: Frozen Reliquary
main.description: The shattered shrines hold a sealed reliquary. Break the frost seal and recover its sigil.

main.name: Rimeheart Siege
main.title: Rimeheart Siege
main.description: A fortress of ice rises from the fog. Breach its outer ring and silence the horn of warning.

main.name: Gate of Rime
main.title: Gate of Rime
main.description: Shatter the frost seals and hold the breach against waves of icebound sentries.

main.name: The Shard Vault
main.title: The Shard Vault
main.description: Within the fortress lies a vault of frozen memory. Extract the shard that guides the storm.

main.name: Ice or Oath
main.title: Ice or Oath
main.description: A guardian demands a pledge: destroy the shard to end the storm, or bind it to your will.

branches.choice: Shatter the shard
Bind the shard

main.name: Stormbreak
main.title: Stormbreak
main.description: The storm relents as the shard is destroyed. The fog thins, revealing deeper paths.

main.name: Oathbound Frost
main.title: Oathbound Frost
main.description: You bind the shard, gaining its cold power while the storm obeys your command.

dungeons.name: Glacierwake Caverns
dungeons.description: Glacial tunnels churn with mist and razor ice. A dormant wyrm stirs beneath the rime.

dungeons.name: Mistveil Labyrinth
dungeons.description: A maze of frozen mirrors and drifting fog that steals warmth and memory.

dungeons.name: Rimebound Catacombs
dungeons.description: Frozen tombs echo with the march of icebound sentries guarding ancient runes.

dungeons.name: Frostspire Abyss
dungeons.description: A vertical chasm of jagged ice where wind howls like spirits in chains.

dungeons.name: Shiverpeak Descent
dungeons.description: The mountain heart fractures into a descent of ice bridges and frozen cliffs.

dungeons.name: Hollow of Hoarfrost
dungeons.description: An open hollow packed with hoarfrost crystals that ignite with bitter cold.

dungeons.name: Coldstar Vault
dungeons.description: A sealed vault of ice etched with constellations, hiding a star-forged relic.

dungeons.name: Everwinter Maw
dungeons.description: A yawning crevasse where the everwinter gathers, feeding on light and heat.

dungeons.name: Veil of Ice
dungeons.description: Veils of frozen mist cloak the path, hiding predators made of sleet.

dungeons.name: Sleetborn Sanctum
dungeons.description: A sanctum of sleet and glassy ice, guarded by a cold-blooded sentinel.

dungeons.name: Cryowind Depths
dungeons.description: The coldest winds in Niflheim churn here, cutting through armor and spirit.

dungeons.name: Frostwyrm Crucible
dungeons.description: A crucible of frost where wyrms are forged in ice and rage.

dungeons.name: Glacial Sepulcher
dungeons.description: A mausoleum of ice where forgotten heroes lie beneath endless snow.

dungeons.name: Mist of Helglass
dungeons.description: Helglass ice refracts the mist into spectral blades that seek the living.

dungeons.name: Niflheim Heart
dungeons.description: The frozen heart of the realm pulses with primal cold. Few return from its core.

q_niflheim_main_01.title: Mistbound Arrival
